body:
Comment 1: 
mbampo,

I use mingw myself, and if I make these http://golang.org/cl/6445082/ changes,
then "go tool pprof" command works fine for me.

I won't comment on your instructions here
http://exneehilo.blogspot.com.au/2012/07/profiling-go-with-pprof-under-windows.html, but
one point: "Add  Go\pkg\tool\[platform] to your system or user PATH variable." The
"tool" directory is not supposed to be in your PATH. Any command you want to run from
there should be executed via "go tool ...".

Alex
_Labels changed: added **os-windows**._ _Owner changed to @alexbrainman._ _Status changed to **Started**._
